CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD( today()- DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, datetimevalue(today()) + 1 +(18/24), /*if Today is Sun,today+1=Monday */ 1, datetimevalue(today()) + 1 +(18/24), /*if Today is Mon,today+1=Tuesday */ 2, datetimevalue(today()) + 1 +(18/24), /*if Today is Tues,today+1=Wednesday */ 3, datetimevalue(today()) + 1 +(18/24), /*if Today is Wed,today+1=Thursday*/ 4, datetimevalue(today()) + 1 +(18/24), /*if Today is Thurs,today+1=Friday */ 5,datetimevalue(today()) + 4 +(18/24), /*if Today is Fri,today+4=Monday next week */ 6,datetimevalue(today()) + 3 +(18/24), /*if Today is Sat,today+3=Monday next week */ datetimevalue(today()) )
CustomField.label: 2 Business Days
